org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapred

接口 TableMap<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<? super K>,V>

  • 类型参数:
    K - WritableComparable key class
    V - Writable value class
    所有超级接口:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConfigurable, org.apache.hadoop.mapred.Mapper<ImmutableBytesWritable,Result,K,V>
    所有已知实现类:
    GroupingTableMap, IdentityTableMap

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public interface TableMap<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<? super K>,V>
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapred.Mapper<ImmutableBytesWritable,Result,K,V>
    Scan an HBase table to sort by a specified sort column. If the column does not exist, the record is not passed to Reduce.

    • 方法概要

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.mapred.Mapper

        map

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConfigurable

        configure

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.io.Closeable

        close
